title: consonantal stems in the Old Anatolian languages see Kammenhuber 1969b: 196–99, 283–91, and Meriggi
While PIE simple t-stems are rare
Due to the wide use and productivity of a derivational suffix -att- used to form action nouns, the number of t-stem nouns in Hittite is fairly large
The only neuter t-stems in Hittite are those in -itt
